entry.title: Violet Birds in Emerald Skies
entry.summary:
Author: Niveara

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,440Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 883

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. This has consequences.

entry.title: Young Justice Can Have a Little Evil As a Treat
entry.summary:
Author: Brownies96

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,015Chapters: 28/35Kudos: 1,412

Summary: Tim snorts, “Right. Obviously, that’s not the full story, but you were in space so we’re good.” He activates the tablet and shows Hal familiar paperwork. “I’ve come to the conclusion that if the League is going to treat me like I’m an unstable rogue, they’re going to have to commit to the bit.”After being treated like unwanted children all their lives, Tim, Kon, Cassie, and Bart start to realise that the adulthood set out before them isn't much better than the past their leaving behind. They decide it's time to make their own way in the world, even if it means being labelled as 'evil'

entry.title: Tears
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 836Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Tim dreams of a heavy press over his body. Of heat and swirling dregs of pleasure between his legs. He floats in an empty void of it, carried on an invisible current. On the edges of his awareness, he can almost hear a voice, soft and soothing. Hot breath fanning in his face. Phantom hands touching his skin. Then the pleasure turns sharp. The weight bears too heavily on him. The soft voice falters into low groans. Something in the empty void sours. Tim feels his body squirm away, but he can’t move. He can’t breathe. Trapped. His eyes flash open with a gasp. The world processes slowly as the dregs of his dream slough out of his mind. The weight and the heat still press at him, press him into the mattress. He wrenches beneath the bulk of a shadow, an indignant sound escaping his lips. Still trapped. “Fuck,” a voice hisses. Breath hot in Tim’s face. “Fuck, no. Go back to sleep._____Tim should have stayed asleep.

entry.title: smoke on the horizon coming through in waves
entry.summary:
Author: Phantomxlegend

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,460Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 62

Summary: “Long week,” Tim admitted, stretching his arms above his head languidly like a cat, a little bit of his shirt riding up to expose the soft white skin of his belly.“Long enough to get high on a Wednesday?” Kon asked, eyes glancing over at the vape pen resting on the bedside table. He couldn’t stop himself from laughing. “Couldn’t even wait until Friday?”“No time on Fridays,” Tim shook his head slowly and then reached out to fumble with the pen on the table next to him, “That’s when all the criminals are out… s’ like they got day jobs or something.”--Tim gets high and he and Kon have sex

entry.title: til you don't choose "right"
entry.summary:
Author: alexndr_writes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,212Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 32

Summary: After years of pining, Kon El and Tim Drake finally shut the hell up and kiss each other. It’s a beautiful, romantic makeout session that leads to them being in a compromising position. Multiple positions, if you want to be historically accurate about the ordeal.Of course in a heat of passion, a lapse in remembering birth control, and the condom breaking… Yeah, these boys were doomed. So, so doomed.After discovering his pregnancy, Tim has to make a decision that will shape his future forever. Kon is completely on board (as a supportive boyfriend should be). But keeping his trans identity, his queer identity, and his mpreg nightmare a secret from his family of detectives? Ha, good luck Tim.OR: Author gets angry about reproductive healthcare being at risk (again) and writes out his nightmare scenario!Title is from the song "How Am I Supposed To Love Myself?" By Beth McCarthy

entry.title: All I Ever Needed Was You
entry.summary:
Author: feelmyheartbeat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,650Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 64

Summary: He couldn’t do this. He just… He couldn’t. It was too much, all of it was too much. While Tim knew that he should try a different position, maybe kneeling by the bed again to let gravity help, but the mere thought of trying to move at all as he was being ripped apart from the inside was too overwhelming. All Tim could do was sob as another contraction crashed into him. He couldn’t even try to push, his strength all but evaporated, but the pain didn’t give him any reprieve. It had already been hours, long hours of building agony, hours where he had trembled and he had gasped and he had outright writhed as the baby refused to descend any further. Tim had tried bracing against the bed, he’d tried standing up outright and even pacing before his legs had started shaking too much to hold his weight. While it had been hours since feeling the urge to push, it had been longer still since those first cramps had become unmistakably contractions.
